Docs.summary: Adds a timeout to the mainloop.
Docs.remarks:
When time time specified passes, the callback will be invoked. If the callback returns true, the timeout will be reset, repeating the invocation. If it returns false, the timeout will stop.
The returned value is a token that can be used to stop the timeout by calling RemoveTimeout.

Docs.summary: Watches a file descriptor for activity.
Docs.remarks:
When the condition is met, the provided callback is invoked. If the callback returns false, the watch is automatically removed.
The return value is a token that represents this watch, you can use this token to remove the watch by calling RemoveWatch.
